TextBody:
Hello Hanif,

Thank you for taking the time to meet today.

Today we:
Migrated and upgraded your NEA installation to a new server.
We verified that the server was working and that the ADI scans were running.
We upgraded and migrated the AIC console as well.

Our next steps are:
You will:
Monitor the environment. Below are the documents detailing how to enable tls on both web consoles.

AIC:https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_11.6/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Secure.htm

NEA:https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Reports/Secure.htm

I will:
Keep your case open until next Monday in case you have any follow up questions.

Thank you,
Ian Ranstrom
Senior Technical Support Engineer
__________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
